Description: he also should know how to deal with ducts factories and have experience dealing with them, as well as knowing how to deal with AC units suppliers ex Coolex and other supplier.We require an engineer with leading talents as he knows how to deal with technicians and formens.the engineer will be responsible for managing large amount of maintenance techniciens.Skills
Skills: The engineer should have no less than 5 years of experience in kuwait for HVAC installation.

Technical Knowledge: You should have a strong understanding of HVAC systems, including their design, installation, and maintenance. This includes knowledge of heating and cooling loads, airflow, ventilation, and ductwork.
Problem-Solving Skills: You should be able to troubleshoot HVAC systems, diagnose problems, and develop solutions to address issues. This includes identifying inefficiencies in systems and proposing solutions to improve performance.
Attention to Detail: HVAC systems can be complex and require precision in their design and installation. You should have a keen eye for detail to ensure systems are properly installed and functioning correctly.
Project Management: You should have the ability to manage HVAC projects from start to finish, including coordinating with contractors and other professionals involved in the installation and maintenance of HVAC systems.
